Class Wedge

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wedge

  • public class Wedge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a wedge for a pie chart. Each wedge consists of a numeric value that described what percentage of the pie should be taken up by this wedge and the text to associate with that wedge.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dean Hougen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double percent
      The percent of the pie that this wedge should occupy.
      private java.lang.String text
      The text describing this wedge.
